title: # 340 - Jordan Harbinger & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Jordan Harbinger to talk about having good social skills, how people read others, dating narcissists, the importance of friends and how to make them, negotiating salary, and I laugh the hardest I've ever laughed on this show!

Follow Jordan on Twitter/Instagram: @JordanHarbinger

His podcast is called "The Jordan Harbinger show" Go to www.jordanharbinger.com for more

This episode is brought to you by Open Fit. Get a free 30 day trial and lose up to 15 pounds by texting “Bert” to 303030

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Joybird. Get 25% off of your first order by using promo code “Bertcast” at www.joybird.com/Bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get 15% off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast and use the promo code “Bertcast”

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $10 go to www.forhims.com/bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Cheers Health. Go to www.cheershealth.com and use the promo code "Bertcast" at checkout for 10% off and a free gift for your first order.

The Body Shots Fall Tour is on pre sale now! Use the promo code "Shots" to get tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer
